Card - Class in Unnamed Package
A container for integer values.

CardDeck - Class in Unnamed Package
A class to store card objects.
CardDeck(int) - Constructor for class CardDeck
The constructor method for the class, sets the id of the CardDeck.
CardGame - Class in Unnamed Package
A card game that utilises threads, where each player (thread) draws a card from the deck to their left and discards one to the deck on their right, whoever has four cards of the same numerical value in their hand wins.
CardGame() - Constructor for class CardGame
 
checkWin() - Method in class Player
Checks if the player has won.
